name: Bombing
description:
This is a short casual game, in which you control a tank in the middle of a bombing. 

Move with WASD, try to avoid the bombs and collect coins.

Try to survive the most you can!

Models :
Drone: http://www.cadnav.com/3d-models/model-48659.html
Bomb: http://www.cadnav.com/3d-models/model-36244.html
Coin: http://www.cadnav.com/plus/download.php?open=0&aid=23643&cid=3
Tank: http://www.cadnav.com/plus/download.php?open=0&aid=42020&cid=3
